content: Do not deviate from the plan - if you think you need to deviate, STOP and ask the user for guidance
Create traits.rs with unified ParamExtractor trait
Create extractors.rs and move all extractors with updated signatures
Create handler.rs with single unified handle_brp_request function
Create mod.rs with public exports for request_handler module
Update support/mod.rs to use new module structure
Find and update all consumer imports throughout the codebase
Build and fix any compile errors and warnings (no dead code, no unused params)

Run cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings -W clippy::all -W clippy::pedantic -W clippy::nursery -W clippy::cargo -A clippy::multiple_crate_versions -A clippy::cargo_common_metadata
Fix any clippy issues (no dead code markers, no underscore prefixes)
If there are test issues, STOP and review them with the user
Task a new subagent to do a code review focusing on duplication and complexity
When subagent returns, STOP and review suggested changes with the user
